import hashlib
import os

def makeIDPFXORMask():
    if 'idpfMask' not in globals():
        try:
            sha = hashlib.sha1()
            temp = strip(getPrimaryIdentifier())
            sha.update(temp.encode('utf-8'))
            globals()['idpfMask'] = sha.digest()
        except NameError:
            print("Did I misspell SHA-1?")
            return None
        except OSError:
            print("Check out mask.write...")
            return None
    return globals()['idpfMask']
